meta.content: Smore helps awesome people like you create gorgeous newsletters.

link.script: // I'm an empty script tag, here to fix FF flash of un-styled content

meta.name: smore:stripe_public_key

div.p: Design and share beautiful newsletters just like this one!
Spread the word with an online newsletter. They're easy to make and impossible to mess up :)

div.div: Smore helps you create amazing newsletters that you'd be proud to share.

div.p: Badges are little rewards for being an active Smore user. Try to get them all :)
Upgrade to a Smore Educator account.
Get 100 visits from iPhones, iPads and iPods.
Get 1,000 visits to a bulletin newsletter.
Get 50 visits each for 5 different flyers.
Get 50 visits within the first hour after publishing a newsletter.
Get 100 aggregate views from Facebook to all your newsletters.
